metadata.name: Aera Bronze Pack
metadata.description: Digital Video Moment - Bronze Pack from Aera by OneFootball. This bronze pack contains three moments from some of your favorite Serie A players with a small chance of receiving a rare, epic or legendary moment! Claiming of the pack will go live on [ccfc.coolcatsnft.com](https://ccfc.coolcatsnft.com) on Dec. 20th and must be claimed by January 19th. To receive you will need to provide a Dapper wallet address.
